msa join ( select ms_fk from MEMBER_SUBSCRIBE where m_pk_user = #{m_pk_user} and ms_type = #{type} ) fk on

(msa.s_pk = fk.ms_fk) join CATEGORYNAME c on (msa.s_category = c.c_pk) left outer join HANDUS_IMAGE hi on (hi.hi_fk = msa.s_pk and hi_main = 1 AND hi_type = 3)
(msa.a_pk = fk.ms_fk) join HANDUS_IMAGE hi on (msa.a_pk = hi.hi_fk and hi.hi_main = 1 AND hi.hi_type = 2) join CATEGORYNAME c on (msa.c_pk = c.c_pk) join auction_graph ag on (msa.a_pk = ag.a_pk) where ag.ag_bidding = ( select max(ag.ag_bidding) from auction_graph ag where msa.a_pk = ag.a_pk )
